column2: my husband and I finally W`E`N`T to Smoque.   Yes
column3: I was warned that their place is small and to avoid busy meal times.   So
column5: we went around 12:30pm.  Oh well.   But while we were waiting in line to order
column6: a gentleman asked how many in our party.  I'm so glad they did not place that burden on us.  This way
